docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Aug, 8--Leopold Stokowski, in a race against time, won by a close margin tonight. Scheduled to appear at the Municipal Theatre at 9 o'clock, he and his All-American Youth Orchestra were behind schedule in arriving here on the liner...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Aug, 8--Leopold Stokowski, in a race against time, won by a close margin tonight. Scheduled to appear at the Municipal Theatre at 9 o'clock, he and his All-American Youth Orchestra were behind schedule in arriving here on the liner Uruguay.

headline.main: YOUTH ORCHESTRA CHEERED IN BRAZIL; Group Directed by Stokowski Gives Concert in Rio de Janeiro

docs.snippet: President Roosevelt last week exchanged Washington's heat and confinement for the cool and relative freedom of the family's Hyde Park estate. He entertained old friends in the comfortable house that little more than a year ago sheltered Britain's...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Roosevelt last week exchanged Washington's heat and confinement for the cool and relative freedom of the family's Hyde Park estate. He entertained old friends in the comfortable house that little more than a year ago sheltered Britain's King and Queen. He took long automobile drives, spent hours sorting material for the ...

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 11--Arnulf Fuhrmann, confessed author of the Nazi military plan for the seizure of Uruguay as a German colony, was arrested by Argentine police at Concordia in Entre Rios Province this afternoon. Concordia is across the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina, Aug. 11--Arnulf Fuhrmann, confessed author of the Nazi military plan for the seizure of Uruguay as a German colony, was arrested by Argentine police at Concordia in Entre Rios Province this afternoon. Concordia is across the Uruguay River from Salto, where Fuhrmann was leader of a Nazi cell.
docs.abstract: A Fuhrmann, Nazi leader, held; deportation likely; press demands steps against subversive acts

headline.main: ARGENTINE POLICE HOLD NAZI LEADER; Fuhrmann Confessed Author of Plan to Seize Uruguay as a German Colony DEPORTATION HELD LIKELY Buenos Aires Press Demands the Government Take Steps Against Subversive Groups Fuhrmann Held Weak-Minded Press Demands Action

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 12 (AP)--The Department of Agriculture estimated today the quantity of wool shorn or to be shorn in the United States this year at 388,692,000 pounds. This estimate is 11,000,000
